name: k0kubun.github.io
body:
# Takashi Kokubun (k0kubun)
Software Engineer, interested in:

- Performance optimization
- Building and contributing to OSS

## Accounts
- https://github.com/k0kubun
- https://twitter.com/k0kubun

## Open source projects
### Most starred projects
- [Hamlit](https://github.com/k0kubun/hamlit) - High Performance Haml Implementation, which is the fastest template engine for Ruby
- [md2key](https://github.com/k0kubun/md2key) - md2key converts markdown to keynote by GUI scripting with AppleScript
- [Nocturn](https://github.com/k0kubun/Nocturn) - Multi-platform Twitter Client built with React, Redux and Electron
- [pp](https://github.com/k0kubun/pp) - Colored pretty printer for Go language
- [github-ranking](https://github.com/k0kubun/github-ranking) - Rails application to show star ranking of GitHub (not maintained)
- [rack-user_agent](https://github.com/k0kubun/rack-user_agent) - Rack::Request extension for handling User-Agent
- [activerecord-precount](https://github.com/k0kubun/activerecord-precount) - ActiveRecord plugin to kill N+1 COUNT queries

### Recent projects (2016)
- [xkremap](https://github.com/k0kubun/xkremap) - Dynamic key remapper for X Window System
- [mitamae](https://github.com/k0kubun/mitamae), [itamae-go](https://github.com/k0kubun/mitamae) - Configuration management tool embedding mruby
- [Barbeque](https://github.com/cookpad/barbeque) - A multi-tenant job queue system to run job with Docker
- [hescape](https://github.com/k0kubun/hescape) - C library for fast HTML escape using SSE instructions
- [clannad](https://github.com/k0kubun/clannad) - C compiler built with LLVM (work in progress)

## Open source contributions
- I'm [a maintainer of Itamae](https://github.com/itamae-kitchen).
- I'm [a contributor of Rails](http://contributors.rubyonrails.org/contributors/takashi-kokubun/commits).
- Optimized byebug 10x faster https://github.com/deivid-rodriguez/byebug/pull/160
- Optimized CRuby's HTML escaping method 7x faster https://github.com/ruby/ruby/pull/1164
- And there are [many other contributions](https://github.com/pulls?q=is%3Aclosed+is%3Apr+author%3Ak0kubun+-user%3Ak0kubun&utf8=%E2%9C%93)

## Work Experience
### Developer Productivity Group, Cookpad Inc. (April 2015 - present)
- Upgrading Rails of cookpad.com, from 4.1 to 4.2 - [Speaker Deck (in Japanese)](http://techlife.cookpad.com/entry/how-to-safely-upgrade-rails)
- Optimizing development environment of Rails application - [Speaker Deck (in Japanese)](https://speakerdeck.com/k0kubun/railsapurikai-fa-huan-jing-falsegao-su-hua)
- Built [Barbeque](https://github.com/cookpad/barbeque), a multi-tenant job queue system using Docker - [Speaker Deck](https://speakerdeck.com/k0kubun/scalable-job-queue-system-built-with-docker)

### Part-time Rails application engineer, Cookpad Inc. (October 2013 - March 2015)
- Developed some web applications using Rails
- Improved functionality and performance of recipe search service using Solr

## Education
### BS Computer Science Tokyo Institute of Technology (March 2015)
Model checking and Fault tolerance. Takuo Watanabe Lab.

## Talks
- Evaluate Ruby Without Ruby, RubyConf 2016 - [SpeakerDeck](https://speakerdeck.com/k0kubun/evaluate-ruby-without-ruby), [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jD0q8uHV5cA)
- Scalable Job Queue System Built with Docker, RubyKaigi 2016 - [SpeakerDeck](https://speakerdeck.com/k0kubun/scalable-job-queue-system-built-with-docker)
- High Performance Template Engine, RubyKaigi 2015 - [SpeakerDeck](https://speakerdeck.com/k0kubun/high-performance-template-engine)
- How I debugged debugger, RubyKaigi 2015 - [SpeakerDeck](https://speakerdeck.com/k0kubun/how-i-debugged-debugger-number-rubykaigi-1)

## Others
- https://speakerdeck.com/k0kubun
- http://k0kubun.hatenablog.com
- http://qiita.com/k0kubun
- https://rubygems.org/profiles/k0kubun
